titleInfo.title: NATIONAL STRATEGY TO COMBAT TERRORIST TRAVEL ACT OF 2016

extension.searchTitle: NATIONAL STRATEGY TO COMBAT TERRORIST TRAVEL ACT OF 2016; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 28

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: National Strategy to Combat Terrorist Travel Act of 2016
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 4408, amended, to require the development of a national strategy to combat terrorist travel, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 392 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 83;

titleInfo.title: MOMENT OF SILENCE FOR VICTIMS OF KALAMAZOO SHOOTINGS

extension.searchTitle: MOMENT OF SILENCE FOR VICTIMS OF KALAMAZOO SHOOTINGS; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 28
FOREIGN FIGHTER REVIEW ACT OF 2016; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 28

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 4402, amended, to require a review of information regarding persons who have traveled or attempted to travel from the United States to support terrorist organizations in Syria and Iraq, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 397 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 84.
